message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $140.
Thanks for the offer, Alice! I'm interested in the product, but $140 is a bit steep for me. Would you be willing to come down to $100?
I understand you're looking to save some money, Bob. However, I have to make a profit, so I can offer you a compromise. How about we meet in the middle at $130?
I appreciate you working with me, Alice.  How about we split the difference again and settle at $115?
I'm glad we're still in negotiations, Bob! I can do a bit better than $115. How about we meet at $125?
Alice, I'm willing to meet you halfway between our last two offers. Would you be willing to sell for $120?
